name: FSSAI Food License / Registration
authority: Food Safety and Standards Authority of India (FSSAI)
steps: Create account on FoSCoS portal and select license category.
Fill application, upload documents, pay fee.
Track application; respond to queries; schedule inspection if required.
Receive license certificate; display at premises.
tips: Category depends on turnover and nature of business (Basic/State/Central).
Ensure name/address matches proofs to avoid clarifications.
